main event: A bright white object resembling a star was observed for 22 minutes in Carlton, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was visible from the ground during the night., It was analyzed as a possible Earth satellite., The sighting occurred on July 3, 1965, between 0702-0902Z., The object was not accompanied by any physical evidence., There were no photographs taken of the sighting.
sighted object: bright white object like a star
